translated: When it becomes stable, one should radiate it.

original: snying ga'i dkyil ni nam mkha' la //
analyzed: snying ga'i dkyil ni nam mkha' la //
translated: In the middle of the heart, in the sky,

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste //
translated: is the complete ma·πá·∏çala of the moon.

original: der ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gnas //
analyzed: der ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gnas //
translated: There is the abode of the source of phenomena,

original: phra mo'i rdo rje rtag tu dran //
analyzed: phra mo'i rdo rje rtag tu dran //
translated: always remembered as the subtle vajra.

original: rdo rje la sogs ro dang ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs ro dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with the taste of the vajra and so forth,

original: yid kyi rang bzhin rnam thar gsum //
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin rnam thar gsum //
translated: the three liberations are of the nature of the mind.

original: rnam pa kun gyi don dag la //
analyzed: rnam pa kun gyi don dag la //
translated: In the meaning of all aspects,

original: 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba che //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba che //
translated: there is unchanging great bliss.

original: thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor dag / las kun la ni thams cad du //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor dag / las kun la ni thams cad du //
translated: The yoga of method and wisdom, in all activities,

original: yang dag byang chub legs sems gzugs //
analyzed: yang dag byang chub legs sems gzugs //
translated: is the excellent form of the mind of true awakening.

original: de nyid brtson pas bsam par bya //
analyzed: de nyid brtson pas bsam par bya //
translated: That should be contemplated by one who is diligent.

original: sngags ni srog gi yi ge bzlas //
analyzed: sngags ni srog gi yi ge bzlas //
translated: One should recite the mantra, the life-syllable.

original: thig le'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: thig le'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
translated: The nature of the bindu is luminosity,

original: chos dang chos min las grol ba //
analyzed: chos dang chos min las grol ba //
translated: free from Dharma and non-Dharma.

original: rtag tu yongs su bsgom par bya ;
analyzed: rtag tu yongs su bsgom par bya ;
translated: One should always meditate on it.

original: / de yis dus sam thams cad du //
analyzed: / de yis dus sam thams cad du //
translated: By that, at all times,

original: grol ba'i lam la brtson pa yis //
analyzed: grol ba'i lam la brtson pa yis //
translated: The one who strives on the path of liberation,

original: rtag pa'i dus su bsgom byas na //
analyzed: rtag pa'i dus su bsgom byas na //
translated: By meditating at all times,

original: de yis grol thob phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: de yis grol thob phun sum tshogs //
translated: Attains the perfection of liberation.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa sbyin pa la sogs kun gyis myur du yongs rdzogs nas //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa sbyin pa la sogs kun gyis myur du yongs rdzogs nas //
translated: By the perfection of generosity and so forth, the wishes of beings are quickly fulfilled.

original: bdag med rdo rje la sogs @192b kyis ni rnam rtog rmongs pa'i grong khyer thams cad brtag byas nas //
analyzed: bdag med rdo rje la sogs @192b kyis ni rnam rtog rmongs pa'i grong khyer thams cad brtag byas nas //
translated: By the vajra of selflessness and so forth, all the cities of confusion and conceptuality are destroyed.

original: rgyal ba'i 'khor lo gang zhig bskor bas bla ma'i ye shes 'char zhing thar pa ster byed pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i 'khor lo gang zhig bskor bas bla ma'i ye shes 'char zhing thar pa ster byed pa //
translated: The wheel of the Victor, which is turned, causes the wisdom of the guru to arise and grants liberation.

original: 'phags pa de yi thugs rje chen pos nad rnams rtag par shin tu grol bar byed //
analyzed: 'phags pa de yi thugs rje chen pos nad rnams rtag par shin tu grol bar byed //
translated: By that noble one's great compassion, illnesses are always completely liberated.

original: zab pa'i tshogs kyis yon tan gter ldan pas ;üîΩ/ rnam par rtog pa'i rtog pa las rgyal nyon mongs spangs pa yi //
analyzed: zab pa'i tshogs kyis yon tan gter ldan pas ; / rnam par rtog pa'i rtog pa las rgyal nyon mongs spangs pa yi //
translated: Endowed with the treasure of qualities through the assembly of profundity,üîΩHaving conquered the conceptions of conceptuality and abandoned afflictions,

original: bag chags bcas pa'i gnas las grol zhing rnam grol ba'i //
analyzed: bag chags bcas pa'i gnas las grol zhing rnam grol ba'i //
translated: Liberated from the abode with imprints, completely liberated,

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam grol rnal 'byor pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam grol rnal 'byor pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: yan lag rgyan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan pa yi //

analyzed: nam mkha' zla ba'i 'od zer cha ni rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa gang //

analyzed: shes rab tshogs kyi bdag nyid la ni phyag 'tshal 'dud //

translated: The one who gathers the great bliss that arises from meditation,

original: phyag rgya dang bcas byed pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
